Interface HTMLElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Home, HTMLManipulable, HTMLNode, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTMLDefaultElement

    public interface HTMLElement
extends HTMLNode, HTMLManipulable
    Author:
    Martire91
    See Also:
    HTMLNode, This interface represents the concept of html element
